## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Is it related to an existing limitation?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative approaches?

## Use Case
Describe a specific use case where this feature would be beneficial.

## Examples
If applicable, provide examples from other tools or plugins.

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Can't use the plugin without it
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor enhancement

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or mockups about the feature request.
